</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds one row of controls according to the RowTemplate class. It returns an array containing row index and array of created controls in a format [<rowIndex>, [<control0>, <control1>...<control n>]].
<br>
Note that rows and headers are indexed separately. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Array]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''ctAddRow''' [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_array = [[ctAddRow]] _control;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
